Thur., Oct. 26: Meet ACLU of Kentucky staff members in your community.
  


George and Kate around the state

Thursday, Oct. 26, 5:30-7 p.m.
Casa Grande
105 Belmont Ave.
Somerset, KY, 42501

Meet staff members in your community

Exciting news! ACLU of Kentucky staff will be in your neighborhood on Thursday, October 26 to meet with members and supporters.

The ACLU of Kentucky Advocay Director Kate Miller and Community Engagement Coordinator George Eklund are touring the state, meeting with members and learning about the civil liberties issues that are important in your community.

We'll provide the appetizers. Questions? Email george@aclu-ky.org or call 502-581-9746.

We look forward to seeing you on Thursday!
